name: Astro Cat
description:
Oh no! Aliens have set up a base on the moon in order to invade Earth - and only Astro Cat can destroy it! Shoot through alien enemies and destroy that base!
 
CONTROLS:
Start: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys/WASD
Shoot: Z/Spacebar

CREDITS:

Programming - Rich

Art - @MokkaQuill

Music & SFX - @TheRealZimm
